content.rendered:
About Us

  • What Defines Us?
  • Why Choose Us?
  • Our Vision

Resilience :
Where thousands of start-ups succumb ever year, we fought back for 14 years creating a niche in the industry with Global Synergies and Partnerships.

Love for Tech :
A true blood Manufacturer , having a large R&D profile with complete backward integration on our minds.

The Determined Dreamer :
A Heart for Technology and a Desire for Problem Solving along with an Innovative Mindfulness.

Out of the box Mavericks :
There is a charm in doing things others believe we cannot;
Non-Traditional Businesses Approach with an innovative thought process.

Considering the inclusion of rural India into the growth of our country is an important aspect for the growth of its individuals. We concur with the visionaries and have focused energies towards Financial Inclusion / Banking / Retail Reseller automations / Dairy Automations and green energy developments. These direction forms our Vision for the next years in the industry.

Aspiration

We aspire to become a large and globally recognized player in the field of innovations and practical implementations of those innovations.

Belief

We believe that no marketing is required to sell a product that is made to perfection and no product is made to perfection till it can sell itself.

We believe in the visions of “Make in India” and “Zero Defect with Zero Effect” pronounced by the visionaries and the same has been proven with the complete back-end integration drive undertaken by us and our past history.

Our USP

Our research oriented approach and not being a product centric company makes us stand out in the otherwise conventional market. This we consider makes us unique and can be considered as our USP.

Our Motto

Our Motto is to Simplify work at all possible stages of an industry. We stitch a tailor-made solution (including Electronic and Mechanical Hardware as well as Softwares) at each of our esteemed client’s requirements. The well-appreciated certitude from our clients is that our system is understandable and usable by a novice and any layman.

Our USP

Our research oriented approach and not being a product centric company makes us stand out in the otherwise conventional market. This we consider makes us unique and can be considered as our USP.

Our Motto

Our Motto is to Simplify work at all possible stages of an industry. We stitch a tailor-made solution (including Electronic and Mechanical Hardware as well as Softwares) at each of our esteemed client’s requirements. The well-appreciated certitude from our clients is that our system is understandable and usable by a novice and any layman.

Our Skills

Thermal Printing Solutions 98%
Metering Solutions 94%
Renewable Energy Solutions 97%
IOT Solutions 96%
Software Solutions 93%
PCB Designing 95%

We create Value Preposition for our customers by:

  • Flexibility in the Design
  • Seamlessly understanding the clients’ needs and limitations
  • Using Agile Methodology at every stage to make every interaction Transparent at every stage
  • Reliability and Continuous Improvement
  • Simple and Durable Solutions
    The above key factors add value to the customers’ success.
  • We seamlessly integrate with our clients’ systems and processes without causing disturbance in the balance.
  • In this era of race against time, we are known to use the limited resources judiciously to generate miraculous outputs.
  • Our team consists of Engineers and highly skilled professionals from varied backgrounds to enable us to deliver smartest solutions at affordable prices.

FOLLOW US ON SOCIAL MEDIA

Facebook-f
Twitter
Linkedin
Instagram
Whatsapp
Amazon
